so_54912228: head -1 file | cut -d'|' -f5

head -1 file | rev | cut -f1 -d'|' | rev

so_13361361: head -1

$ date=`cat myfile.csv | head -1 | grep -o -e "[0-9]\{4\}-[0-9]\{2\}-[0-9]\{2\}" | head -1`
$ echo $date
2012-11-01
$ mv myfile.csv myfile.$date.csv

Explanations about Options.-n:
print the first NUM lines instead of the first 10; with the leading '-', print all
 but the last NUM lines of each file
